item.title: US chess grandmaster Daniel Naroditsky dies aged 29
item.description: The young prodigy's "unexpected passing" was announced by his family on Monday.

item.title: Belize agrees to host migrants seeking asylum in US
item.description: Belize's prime minister says the deal will mean that migrants can apply for asylum in the country.

item.title: Woman charged after 1.5m euros of gold stolen from Paris museum
item.description: Prosecutors say the woman was arrested in Barcelona with around a kilo of melted down gold.

item.title: Tornado hits Paris suburbs leaving one dead
item.description: A 23-year-old construction worked has been killed after a tornado tore through Val-d'Ois, north of Paris, on Monday, toppling three construction crane...

item.title: French ex-president Sarkozy goes to jail for campaign finance conspiracy
item.description: Nicolas Sarkozy, president from 2007-2012, has appealed against his jail term at La Sant√© prison.
